column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Another possible negative is seating. It can get a little crowded and they may put you at one of the pretty tables. The two tables have bench seats all around
column2: so you might sit next to another couple. It is not like a Japanese steakhouse. It's standard order and serve. Nonetheless
column4: I was just happy to get one of the small booths for two.
